name: NumberTennis

”Alexa, open Number Tennis”
”Alexa, play Number Tennis”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: number tennis
des:
DESCRIPTION:
Number Tennis is a counting game for one to six players. All you need to do is count to 21 with Alexa. But, every time you get to 21 a new rule will be added to the game. For example, every multiple of 5 you need to say carrot instead of the number. If you also had a rule for every multiple of 10 you need to say potato, you would have to say carrot, potato for the numbers 10 and 20. The game can be played by one to six players. Tennis sounds will be used to indicate when it is your turn to speak. If you say 2 or 3 numbers at a time you will score more points and you can climb to the top of the leaderboard.

SINGLE PLAYER MODE:
You will play with Alexa and take it turns to say a number in the sequence. Alexa is so clever, she always knows the correct answer. See how many levels you can complete and how complex you can make the game. Score more points and get to the top of the single player leaderboard.

MULTIPLAYER MODE:
This is a team challenge. Each player will be given a character name, they need to remember who they are given. You will be chosen at random to say the next number in the sequence. Be warned it could go straight back to the same player. See how many levels you can complete. Score more points and get to the top of the multiplayer leaderboard. Good luck!

TIPS:
1) If you say an answer that is correct, but for some reason Alexa doesn't understand, you can shout "ALEXA, CHALLENGE THAT!" Then using some Eagle eye technology we can work out if what you said was correct. You get one free challenge a day.
2) The game ends if you don't say anything after I prompt you for an answer. Your progress in the game will be lost. Just say "I don't know" if you can't think of anything to say.
3) Get close to the device and keep background noise to a minimum. 

THEMES:
Fruit and vegetables
Ice Cream Flavours

CHARACTERS:
Major Piccolo Co - Cat
Lieutenant Whoopee Doo Doo - Dog
Colonel Honkey - Donkey
Captain CoCo Nutty - Monkey
General Squeakers - Mouse
Sergeant Quackerz - Duck

EDUCATIONAL:
The game is designed to be fun but also a bit of a challenge for the brain. It's a great way to practice your maths and learn division and multiplication. The game is based on a game I used to play at school when I was younger that helped me with my maths at a young age :)

ECHO SHOW:
You can ask to see the leaderboard.
"Alexa, show me the single player leaderboard."
"Alexa, show me the multiplayer leaderboard."

MY OTHER SKILLS:
The Category Game - Make sure you say "The" It's the best category game in the skill store. 
Word Tennis - Categories game for 1 to 6 players, if you like number tennis, you will love this one!
Mystery Sound - See if you can guess the mystery sounds.
Big Fart - "Alexa, open big fart". Have a laugh and open big fart.
Kiss Marry Avoid - "Alexa, open kiss marry avoid"


I hope you enjoy the game!
